Sp-U: White spear for Campanella
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds: Sp-U: White spear for Campanella
By Thorr on Thursday, December 19, 2002 - 07:20 am:

This has been mentioned in other posts, but not fully definitive info has been posted. I just acquired the White Spear and have determined that you must do the following:

1) Raise a Gitan to Class A

2) Bring the Gitan to the Promiass Ruins.

3) In the Northeast corner of the ruins, you will come to a small box-like temple. A mandatory event will take place where Karnab and Holly try to pull a stick out of the ground.

4) Your Gitan will pull the stick out. this stick is the White Spear. Your expedition will end immediately after this event.

5) Use the White Spear as a combining item to create a Campanella (Gitan/SP-U).

It's easy to do as long as you can put up with raising a Gitan. I recommend using the Pickle (Gitan/SP-U). He was very good for me.

-Thorr
